definition: phonetic character used in loanwords for the sound "jia", although 夹 is more common
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
variant of 夾克|夹克[jia1 ke4]
Qiezihe district of Qitaihe city 七台河[Qi1 tai2 he2], Heilongjiang
see 聖女果|圣女果[sheng4 nu:3 guo3]

pinyin: Ou1 mi3 jia1 Biao3 Gong1 si1

definition: see 聖女果|圣女果[sheng4 nu:3 guo3]

sentences.english: The Paper describes the applications of Roselle and the ex tracting and re fining procedures of Roselle seed oil.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了玫瑰茄的用途，玫瑰茄籽油的制取及精炼工艺。

sentences.english: The article expounded the influencing factors on the stability of the Roselle red pigment.
sentences.chinese: 阐述对玫瑰茄红色素稳定性的影响因素。

sentences.english: The red pigment extracted from Roselle cells showed unstability to light irradiation.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰茄细胞红色素对光不稳定。

sentences.english: Some potato family preserve freshness technique measures were suggested.
sentences.chinese: 就茄果类蔬菜贮藏保鲜技术提出措施建议。

sentences.english: Studies on the optimum conditions in extracting mono-anthocyanin in Hibiscus sabdariffa L.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰茄花青素提取条件优化研究。

sentences.english: Qualitative study on the structure of roselle calyx red pigment;
sentences.chinese: 对玫瑰茄花萼化学成分和药理作用进行了综述。

sentences.english: This species is in original black and bright purple long eggplant basis.
sentences.chinese: 本品种是在原黑又亮紫长茄基础上。

sentences.english: In the summer, drinking some Roselle also has an efficiency of clearing away heat and summer heat.
sentences.chinese: 在夏季饮用些玫瑰茄还有清热解暑的功能。
含14克蛋白质和3毫克奥米茄3必须脂肪酸。

sentences.english: Light irradiation did not affect the biomass of roselle cell suspension.
sentences.chinese: 光照对悬浮培养的玫瑰茄细胞生物量无影响。

definition: bound form used only in 苣蕒菜|苣荬菜[qu3 mai3 cai4]/Taiwan pr. [ju4]
water spinach or ong choy (Ipomoea aquatica), used as a vegetable in south China and southeast Asia/Taiwan pr. [yong1]
Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
